title: Appointment Management + POS System
description:
This system is commissioned by a beauty services establishment to
  • facilitate employees' appointment scheduling,
  • automate management of product inventory,
  • tracking of pre-purchased customer credits which can be used to offset service costs,
  • process sales of products and services rendered and generate a receipt,
  • interface with a barcode scanner, receipt printer and cash drawer,
  • generate various reports for accounting and business development purposes.

items.description: Calendar showing all employees, their activities and available timeslots.
Blocking timeslot for service booked by customer. Booked service can be extended, decreased, re-assigned to other employees.
Employee availability will appear on both leave schedule and appointment schedule.
Customer records can be accessed from calendar directly.
Add products and services to purchase list, assign assistant.
Applying discounts to items on purchase list
Using customers' pre-purchased credits to offset service costs
View all sales for selected period
